column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Dzi Midianfo wer ma Israelmba ho: na n'ekyir no akɛka wo nkorɔfo ho wɔ nsamankyir."

column2: "Na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ ɔman no dɛ
column3: Hom mma hom mu mbanyin mmia mma ɔsa no
column5: na wɔmfa EWURADZE n'awerdzi nkɔ Midianfo do."

column2: "Hom mma Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu
column3: ebusuakuw biara mu nyimpa apem nkɔ ɔsa no."

column2: "Nna woyiyii Israel mpempem mu mpemduebien a womiae maa ɔsa no
"Na Moses somaa hɔn
column5: hɔn nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar ne babanyin Finehas ɔdze ahotseweebea ndzɛmba no na ewubɔ ntotorobɛnto no wɔ ne nsamu na wɔkɔr ɔsa no."

column2: "Na wɔnye Midian kɔkoe dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no; na wokunkum mbanyin no nyinara."
"Na wokunkum Midian ahemfo no kaa hɔn atɔfo nkaa no ho. Evi
column6: nye Reba Midian ahemfo beenum no; na wɔdze nkrantsee kum Beor ne babanyin Balaam so."

column2: "Na Israelmba no faa Midian mbaa no nye hɔn mbofraba no ndɔmmum; na wɔfoom hɔn ofiembowa nyinara
"Na wɔdze ogya hyehyeew hɔn nkurow nyinara wɔ mbeambea a wɔtsetsee no
"Na wɔfaa asadze no nyinara
"Na wɔdze ndɔmmum no
column7: nye Israel mboanofo no; wɔ nseraban no mu wɔ Moab tɛtɛr a ɔda Jeriko Jordan ho no do."

column2: "Na Moses
column4: nye mboanofo no mu mbapɔmba no nyinara fiir edzi kehyiaa hɔn wɔ nseraban no ekyir."

column2: "Na Moses no bo fuuw dɔm no hɔn asafohemfo no
column3: apem apem do asafohemfo nye ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo a wofi asayɛ bae no."

column2: "Na Moses see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana hom agye mbaa no nyinara nkwa?"

column2: "Hwɛ
column5: wɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔn tsiaa EWURADZE wɔ Peor asɛm no mu
column6: na ɔmaa ɔyardɔm baa EWURADZE no mboanofo mu no."

column2: "Afei dɛm ntsi hom nkuku mbofraba no mu mbanyin nyinara
column3: na wonku ɔbaa biara a oehu ɔbanyin dɛ ɔnye no ada."

column2: "Na mbaa mbofraba a wonnhun ɔbanyin dɛ wɔnye no ada no dze
column3: hom ngye hɔn nkwa mma homho."

column2: "Na hom nkyer nsera wɔ nseraban no ekyir nda esuon: obiara a oeku nyimpa bi no
column3: nye obiara a ɔaka ɔtɔfo bi no
column4: hom ntsew homho da a otsia ebiasa no
column5: nye da a otsia esuon no

column2: "Na atar biara dze
column3: nye adze a wɔdze nwoma ayɛ nyinara
column5: nye adze a wɔdze dua ayɛ nyinara

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Eleazar see mbanyin akofo a wɔkɔr akono no dɛ
column3: Iyi nye mbra a EWURADZE dze ahyɛ Moses no mu ahyɛdze:"

column2: "naaso sika nye dwetɛ
column10: na no ho ntsew; naaso hom mfa ahoguar nsu no ntsew ho: na adze a onnkotum ogya no nyinara

column2: "Na hom nhor hom ntar da a otsia esuon no
column4: na n'ekyir no na hom mbra nseraban no mu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ mbu
column4: "Ɔwo nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar nye mboanofo no egyanom efi mu etsitsir no
column8: "na kyɛ afonam no mu akyɛkyɛ ebien; ma mbanyin akofo a wɔkɔr akono no

column2: "na gye mbanyin asayɛfo a wɔkɔr akono no hɔ tow ma EWURADZE: nyimpa
column5: nye nguankuw mu ahaenum mu nkorkor:"

column2: "gye no wɔ hɔn ɔfa no mu
"Na Israelmba ɔfa mu dze
column7: mekyerɛ ofiembowa nyinara mu eduonum eduonum mu nkorkor
column8: na fa ma Levifo no a wɔhwɛ EWURADZE ntamadan ahwɛdodze do no."

column2: "Na Moses nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."
"Afei afonam a ɔbor asadze a mbanyin asayɛfo no fae no do no
column10: mbaa a wonnhun ɔbanyin dɛ wɔnye no ada

column2: "Na ɔfa no a ɔyɛ hɔn a wotui kɔr ɔsa no hɔn kyɛfa no
column3: no dodow yɛ nguan mpemahaebiasa eduasa esuon nye ahaenum:"

column2: "na nguan no mu ɔtow a woyiyii maa EWURADZE no yɛ ahaesia eduosuon enum."
"Na anantwi no yɛ mpemeduasa esia; hɔn mu ɔtow a woyiyii maa EWURADZE yɛ eduosuon ebien."
"Na nsoasopɔnkɔ no yɛ mpemeduasa nye ahaenum; hɔn mu ɔtow a woyiyii maa EWURADZE yɛ eduosia biako."
"Na nyimpa no yɛ mpemduesia; hɔn mu ɔtow a woyiyii maa EWURADZE yɛ nyimpa eduasa ebien."
"Na Moses dze ɔtow a ɔyɛ EWURADZE ɔmado afɔr no maa ɔsɔfo Eleazar
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na Israelmba hɔn ɔfa no a Moses gyee no wɔ akofo no hɔ no mu dze
column4: "(afei mboanofo no hɔn ɔfa no yɛ nguan mpemahaebiasa eduasa

column2: "nye Israelmba hɔn ɔfa no mu dze
column3: Moses faa eduonum eduonum mu nkorkor
column5: na ɔdze maa Levifo no a wɔhwɛ EWURADZE ntamadan ahwɛdodze do no; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na asafohemfo a wɔhwɛ dɔm mpempem do no
column4: nye ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no

column2: "na wɔbɛsee no dɛ
column3: Wo nkowaa yeebu akofo a wɔwɔ hɛn nsamu no ano
column4: na hɛn mu nyimpa kor mpo annyew."

column2: "Na yɛdze EWURADZE n'ayɛyɛdze aba
column3: dza nyimpa biara enya no a
column10: dɛ wɔmfa mpata mma hɛn akra wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na Moses nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar gyee hɔn hɔ sika no
"Na ɔmado afɔr sika nyinara a wɔdze brɛ EWURADZE a ofi apem apem do asafohemfo
column3: nye ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo hɔ no

column2: "Na akofo no hɔn afom asadze dze
"Na Moses nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar gyee sika no wɔ apem apem nye ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no hɔ
column3: na wɔdze baa ehyiadzibuw no mu
column4: dɛ ɔnyɛ Israelmba no nkaadze wɔ EWURADZE enyim."
